item.title: Raspberry Pi GPIO labelling
item.description: One problem that often occurs, when building circuits, are the unlabelled GPIO pins of the Raspberry Pi. Counting the GPIO pins is a typical task when working with the inputs and outputs. Labels or so called “reference cards” that put on the GPIO pin header, can solve the problem.
